ingredients: ['oil', 'cumin seed', 'mustard seeds', 'methi seeds', 'turmeric powder', 'green chili', 'dried red chili', 'ginger', 'thyme', 'salt', 'tomatoes', 'eggplant', 'sweet pepper', 'brown sugar']
